titles.title: Own Your Own Data Act
Own Your Own Data Act
A bill to prohibit the collection of data or information generated on the internet.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Own Your Own Data Act
This bill requires a social media company to (1) provide a user with the ability to obtain and export their user data, along with any analysis of such data by the company; and (2) ensure that each user knowingly and willingly licenses their data to the company during the registration of an account.
